Original: This is a request specifically to
investigate [Color:5]B2F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
It mentions a large hole in an
unnaturally caved-in area on the
southern path... Have you seen this?
[Page]
The client took a lit torch at [Color:5]night[Color:0]
to look inside, and was met with an
unknown monster springing out.
[Page]
My hopes are that it is merely a
misunderstanding... but someone must
look into it. If that will be you...
[Page]
Then I await your swift return.
The Woodlands are dangerous at night,
so be on your guard.
Translation: This is a request specifically to
investigate [Color:5]B2F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0].
[Page]
It mentions a large hole in an
unnaturally caved-in area on the
southern path... Have you seen this?
[Page]
The client took a lit torch at [Color:5]night[Color:0]
to look inside, and was met with an
unknown monster springing out.
[Page]
My hopes are that it is merely a
misunderstanding... but someone must
look into it. If that will be you...
[Page]
Then I await your swift return.
The Woodlands are dangerous at night,
so be on your guard.

Original: Welcome back. Did you figure out the
mystery of the hole?
[Page]
A monster did indeed emerge from it?
Hmm... It may be best sometimes to
leave well enough alone.
[Page]
Though there is some irony in saying
that to a band of professional
explorers...
[Page]
I again thank you. I shall let my
other explorer patrons know to be
more careful in their outings.
Translation: Welcome back. Did you figure out the
mystery of the hole?
[Page]
A monster did indeed emerge from it?
Hmm... It may be best sometimes to
leave well enough alone.
[Page]
Though there is some irony in saying
that to a band of professional
explorers...
[Page]
I again thank you. I shall let my
other explorer patrons know to be
more careful in their outings.

Original: Despite being caught in an ambush,
you manage to defeat the hideous
scorpion!
[Page]
Your previous experience has not shown
B2F to be a habitat for scorpions...
You wonder where it came from.
[Page]
It raises several questions, but for
now, you write your report on a scroll
that you might deliver it to the bar.
Translation: Despite being caught in an ambush,
you manage to defeat the hideous
scorpion!
[Page]
Your previous experience has not shown
B2F to be a habitat for scorpions...
You wonder where it came from.
[Page]
It raises several questions, but for
now, you write your report on a scroll
that you might deliver it to the bar.

Original: You arrive at the specified location
on B2F with the hole spoken of in the
request you accepted.
[Page]
Just as you were told at the bar,
there is a gaping hole here that
appears bottomless...
[Page]
But it seems harmless enough. Perhaps
you must come here at night, as the
request mentioned.
Translation: You arrive at the specified location
on B2F with the hole spoken of in the
request you accepted.
[Page]
Just as you were told at the bar,
there is a gaping hole here that
appears bottomless...
[Page]
But it seems harmless enough. Perhaps
you must come here at night, as the
request mentioned.

Original: After darkness falls, you arrive at
the specified location on B2F spoken
of in the request you accepted.
[Page]
Just as you were told at the bar,
there is a gaping hole here that
appears bottomless...
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, you
must ready a torch and shed light
into it.
Translation: After darkness falls, you arrive at
the specified location on B2F spoken
of in the request you accepted.
[Page]
Just as you were told at the bar,
there is a gaping hole here that
appears bottomless...
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, you
must ready a torch and shed light
into it.

Original: [Color:5]Shed light into the hole?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Shed light into the hole?[Color:0]

Original: You cautiously look into the hole,
angling your torch to cast the light
deeper inside...
[Page]
When suddenly, a scratching sound
echoes from the hole and a hideous
scorpion jumps out!
Translation: You cautiously look into the hole,
angling your torch to cast the light
deeper inside...
[Page]
When suddenly, a scratching sound
echoes from the hole and a hideous
scorpion jumps out!

Original: As the story you heard went, it was
shedding light into the hole that
caused the monster to emerge.
[Page]
Thinking that you cannot be too
careful, you decide to survey the
situation first.
Translation: As the story you heard went, it was
shedding light into the hole that
caused the monster to emerge.
[Page]
Thinking that you cannot be too
careful, you decide to survey the
situation first.
